participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Friendly and curious, Alex enjoys engaging with new people and exploring different topics.
participant_1.background: Alex is a marketing professional who loves to travel and share experiences with others.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and witty, Jordan has a knack for making conversations lively and entertaining.
participant_2.background: Jordan is a graphic designer who spends her free time volunteering and participating in community events.
